biotools.summary: Model the overall tri­nucleotide periodicity of ribosomal occupancy using a classifier based on spectral coherence. Examine the relationship of normalized ribosome profiling read coverage over a rolling series of windows along a transcript relative to an idealized reference signal without the matched requirement of mRNA-Seq.

bioschemas.name: SPECtre
bioschemas.summary: Model the overall tri­nucleotide periodicity of ribosomal occupancy using a classifier based on spectral coherence. Examine the relationship of normalized ribosome profiling read coverage over a rolling series of windows along a transcript relative to an idealized reference signal without the matched requirement of mRNA-Seq.
